com.inqwell.any.client

Interface RenderInfo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Any, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnyRenderInfo, ListRenderInfo

    public interface RenderInfo
extends Any
    Definition for rendering support of GUIs
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    $Author: sanderst $

      • getFormatString

        String getFormatString()
        Attempt to return the prevailing format string. If there is no descriptor and no explicit format string has been established then null will be returned.

      • setAlwaysEvaluate

        void setAlwaysEvaluate(boolean b)
        If set to true then the rendered value will be evaluated for all event types, specifically, including updates.

      • setDataNode

        void setDataNode(Any dataNode)
        Establish the data to render. This can be an expression which will be evaluated.

      • setEditingList

        void setEditingList(AnyListModel list)
        Establish sub-rendering information when a list of editable items is desired

      • setResponsibleData

        void setResponsibleData(Locate data)
        Provide an optional expression for the actual data node this RenderInfo is responsible for. If provided as well as that to setDataNode then will be used to build data for on-the-fly data model creation.

      • getLabel

        String getLabel()
        Return rendering label

      • resolveDataNode

        Any resolveDataNode(Any root,
                    boolean force,
                    boolean build)
             throws AnyException
        Request the data to be rendered. An expression may be evaluated from the given root. Caching the result is supported via the force parameter. TODO: build arg is no longer used - to be removed
        Throws:
        AnyException

      • getEditingList

        AnyListModel getEditingList()
        If our editing possibilities are constrained to a list of items then return the RenderInfo for this. Otherwise return null

      • resolveNodeSpecs

        void resolveNodeSpecs(Map nodeSpecs,
                      Any contextNode)
        Support for events. Generate the node specifications that this object would require re-evaluation for from node events. The map will contain the node specifications as keys and the field set as values.

      • resolveNodeSpecs

        void resolveNodeSpecs(Any contextNode)

      • getNodeSpecs

        Map getNodeSpecs()
        Support for events. Return the node specifications that this object would require re-evaluation for from node events. The map contains the node specifications as keys and the field set as values.
